description: Izzy, I thought we ran a tighter-ship than this.
Yes sir, but you really need to control your gas issues anyway.
Oh dear this will have to be looked into.
Mr. Nook don't you dare. That coffee sustains me.
Just spread your wings and imagine your words soaring away from you into the ears of the rest of us. OMG A BUG GRUHUHHHUHUHEWWW.
